16  package com.okta.spring.oauth.env;
17  
18  import com.okta.commons.configcheck.ConfigurationValidator;
19  import com.okta.spring.oauth.discovery.DiscoveryPropertySource;
20  import org.springframework.boot.SpringApplication;
21  import org.springframework.boot.env.EnvironmentPostProcessor;
22  import org.springframework.boot.env.YamlPropertySourceLoader;
23  import org.springframework.core.Ordered;
24  import org.springframework.core.env.ConfigurableEnvironment;
25  import org.springframework.core.env.Environment;
26  import org.springframework.core.env.MapPropertySource;
27  import org.springframework.core.env.PropertySource;
28  import org.springframework.core.io.ClassPathResource;
29  import org.springframework.core.io.FileSystemResource;
30  import org.springframework.core.io.Resource;
31  import org.springframework.util.ClassUtils;
32  import org.springframework.util.StringUtils;
33  
34  import java.io.File;
35  import java.io.IOException;
36  import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
37  import java.lang.reflect.Method;
38  import java.util.Collections;
39  import java.util.HashMap;
40  import java.util.List;
41  import java.util.Map;
42  import java.util.Optional;
43  
44  /**
45   * This {@link EnvironmentPostProcessor} configures additional {@link PropertySource}s that map OIDC discovery metadata
46   * and standard Okta properties to standard Spring Boot OAuth2 properties.
47   *
48   * <p>
49   *     <table summary="Property mapping">
50   *         <tr>
51   *             <th>Okta Property</th>
52   *             <th>Spring Boot Property</th>
53   *         </tr>
54   *         <tr>
55   *             <td>okta.oauth2.client-id</td>
56   *             <td>security.oauth2.client.client-id</td>
57   *         </tr>
58   *         <tr>
59   *             <td>okta.oauth2.client-secret</td>
60   *             <td>security.oauth2.client.client-secret</td>
61   *         </tr>
62   *     </table>
63   * Discovery properties:
64   * <p>
65   *     <table summary="Property mapping">
66   *         <tr>
67   *             <th>Discovery Property</th>
68   *             <th>Spring Boot Property</th>
69   *         </tr>
70   *         <tr>
71   *             <td>OidcDiscoveryMetadata.getTokenEndpoint()</td>
72   *             <td>security.oauth2.client.access-token-uri</td>
73   *         </tr>
74   *         <tr>
75   *             <td>OidcDiscoveryMetadata.getAuthorizationEndpoint()</td>
76   *             <td>security.oauth2.client.user-authorization-uri</td>
77   *         </tr>
78   *         <tr>
79   *             <td>OidcDiscoveryMetadata.getUserinfoEndpoint()</td>
80   *             <td>security.oauth2.resource.user-info-uri</td>
81   *         </tr>
82   *     </table>
83   * As well as updating default properties values from 'com.okta.spring.okta.yml'. And setting 'okta.client.org-url' based
84   * on 'okta.oauth2.issuer'
85   *
86   * NOTE: for discovery can be disabled by setting the property {@code okta.oauth2.discoveryDisabled=true}.
87   *
88   * @since 0.2.0
89   */
90  public class OktaPropertiesMappingEnvironmentPostProcessor implements EnvironmentPostProcessor, Ordered {
91  
92      private static final String OAUTH_CLIENT_PREFIX = "security.oauth2.client.";
93      private static final String OAUTH_RESOURCE_PREFIX = "security.oauth2.resource.";
94      private static final String OKTA_OAUTH_PREFIX = "okta.oauth2.";
95      private static final String OKTA_OAUTH_ISSUER = OKTA_OAUTH_PREFIX + "issuer";
96      private static final String OKTA_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID = OKTA_OAUTH_PREFIX + "clientId";
97      private static final String OKTA_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET = OKTA_OAUTH_PREFIX + "clientSecret";
98      private static final String OKTA_OAUTH_AUDIENCE = OKTA_OAUTH_PREFIX + "audience";
99  
100     @Override
101     public void postProcessEnvironment(ConfigurableEnvironment environment, SpringApplication application) {
102 
103         // Validate only Okta properties
104         String issuer = environment.getProperty(OKTA_OAUTH_ISSUER);
105         Optional.ofNullable(issuer).ifPresent(ConfigurationValidator::validateOrgUrl);
106 
107         String clientId = environment.getProperty(OKTA_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID);
108         Optional.ofNullable(clientId).ifPresent(ConfigurationValidator::validateClientId);
109 
110         String clientSecret = environment.getProperty(OKTA_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET);
111         Optional.ofNullable(clientSecret).ifPresent(ConfigurationValidator::validateClientSecret);
112 
113         environment.getPropertySources().addLast(remappedOktaToStandardOAuthPropertySource(environment));
114         environment.getPropertySources().addLast(loadYaml(new FileSystemResource(new File(System.getProperty("user.home"), ".okta/okta.yml")), false));
115         environment.getPropertySources().addLast(loadYaml(new FileSystemResource(new File(System.getProperty("user.home"), ".okta/okta.yaml")), false));
116         environment.getPropertySources().addLast(new DiscoveryPropertySource(environment));
117         environment.getPropertySources().addLast(oauthToClientPropertiesSource(environment));
118         environment.getPropertySources().addLast(loadYaml(new ClassPathResource("com/okta/spring/okta.yml"), true));
119     }
120 
121     private PropertySource<?> loadYaml(Resource resource, boolean required) {
122         YamlPropertySourceLoader loader = new YamlPropertySourceLoader();
123         if (!resource.exists() && required) {
124             throw new IllegalArgumentException("Resource " + resource + " does not exist");
125         }
126 
127         if (resource.exists()) {
128             try {
129 
130                 // Spring Boot 2
131                 Method method = ClassUtils.getMethodIfAvailable(YamlPropertySourceLoader.class,"load", String.class, Resource.class);
132                 if (method != null) {
133                     List<PropertySource<?>> list = (List<PropertySource<?>>) method.invoke(loader, resource.getFilename(), resource);
134                     return list.get(0); // TODO: hack
135                 } else {
136                     // Spring Boot 1.x
137                     return loader.load(resource.getFilename(), resource, null);
138                 }
139             } catch (IllegalAccessException | InvocationTargetException | IOException ex) {
140                 throw new IllegalStateException("Failed to load yaml configuration from " + resource, ex);
141             }
142         } else {
143             return new MapPropertySource("Missing "+ resource.getFilename(), Collections.emptyMap());
144         }
145     }
146 
147     /**
148      * Map {@code okta.oauth2.*} properties to {@code security.oauth2.*}.
149      * @param environment Environment used to read the known 'okta' properties from.
150      * @return A PropertySource containing the newly mapped values.
151      */
152     private PropertySource remappedOktaToStandardOAuthPropertySource(Environment environment) {
153         Map<String, String> aliasMap = new HashMap<>();
154 
155         // when we drop Spring Boot 1.x support these properties should be changed to kabab format
156         aliasMap.put(OAUTH_CLIENT_PREFIX + "clientId", OKTA_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID);
157         aliasMap.put(OAUTH_CLIENT_PREFIX + "clientSecret", OKTA_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET);
158         aliasMap.put(OAUTH_RESOURCE_PREFIX + "serviceId", OKTA_OAUTH_AUDIENCE);
159         return new RemappedPropertySource("okta-to-oauth2", aliasMap, environment);
160     }
161 
162     /**
163      * Maps the baseUrl of {@code okta.oauth2.issuer} to {@code okta.client.org-url}.
164      * @param environment Environment used to read the {@code okta.oauth2.*} properties from.
165      * @return A PropertySource containing the newly mapped values.
166      */
167     private PropertySource oauthToClientPropertiesSource(final Environment environment) {
168         return new IssuerToOrgUrlPropertySource(environment);
169     }
170 
171     @Override
172     public int getOrder() {
173         return LOWEST_PRECEDENCE;
174     }
175 
176     private static class IssuerToOrgUrlPropertySource extends PropertySource {
177 
178         private final Environment environment;
179 
180         private IssuerToOrgUrlPropertySource(Environment environment) {
181             super("okta-oauth-to-client");
182             this.environment = environment;
183         }
184 
185         @Override
186         public Object getProperty(String name) {
187             if (containsProperty(name)) {
188                 // first lookup the issuer
189                 String issuerUrl = environment.getProperty(OKTA_OAUTH_PREFIX + "issuer");
190                 // if we don't have one just return null
191                 if (StringUtils.hasText(issuerUrl)) {
192                     return issuerUrl.substring(0, issuerUrl.lastIndexOf("/oauth2/"));
193                 }
194             }
195             return null;
196         }
197 
198         @Override
199         public boolean containsProperty(String name) {
200             return "okta.client.org-url".equals(name) || "okta.client.orgUrl".equals(name);
201         }
202     }
203 }
